attributes.action: Bring back national service instead of ASBO's & Unfair Jail terms
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Make young people & convicted criminals of this country learn respect & disipline. The evil people in this country should repay their debt to society by protecting it instead of filling up the jails.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/country-service/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
